rows.label: qev099701_MSG0001
rows.name: Hey there! You! Dreamboat![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev099701_MSG0002
rows.name: I've got a line on a tasty little job. You interested?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev099701_MSG0003
rows.name: Preeeetty sure you won't regret it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev099701_JNK0010
rows.name: Listen

rows.label: qev099701_SEL0011
rows.name: Hear Lara Mara out.

rows.label: qev099701_JNK0020
rows.name: Ignore

rows.label: qev099701_SEL0021
rows.name: Decide it sounds shady and walk away.

rows.label: qev099701_MSG0004
rows.name: Curious, are we?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev099701_MSG0005
rows.name:
I do love a [ST:gender p1=boy p2=girl ] with an open mind and a go-getter
attitude. Besides, where's the fun in being a BLADE if
you're not making money?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev099701_MSG0006
rows.name: Rude! And after I told you you wouldn't regret it, too![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev099701_MSG0007
rows.name: The least you could do is hear me out. Sheesh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev099701_MSG0008
rows.name: Or is this you playing hard to get? You sly dog![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev099701_MSG0009
rows.name:
I'm afraid that won't work on me, sugar.
Now be a good [ST:gender p1=boy p2=girl ] and listen.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev099701_MSG0010
rows.name:
I've got a mission direct from Commander Vandham,
you see.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev099701_MSG0011
rows.name: A new Lifehold unit's been spotted in Sylvalum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev099701_MSG0012
rows.name:
Anyway, I was hoping a strapping young thing like
you could help out with the investigation and recovery.
...See? Told you it was juicy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev099701_MSG0013
rows.name:
Not that this job doesn't come with a laundry list of
questions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev099701_MSG0014
rows.name:
Like why we're only noticing the thing now...
Or why the Ganglion haven't touched it...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev099701_MSG0015
rows.name:
All part of the fun of investigating, I suppose!
It's jobs like this where we BLADEs earn our salt.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev099701_MSG0016
rows.name:
There are some unknowns, sure, but I'd still file this job
in the easy end of things.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev099701_MSG0017
rows.name:
So there you go and you're welcome.
Best of luck, tiger.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev099701_MSG0018
rows.name:
I still think it's strange that the Ganglion haven't noticed
a Lifehold unit in Sylvalum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev099701_MSG0019
rows.name:
I suppose we don't have a complete picture of their
tech level yet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev099701_MSG0020
rows.name:
Maybe our radar and surveillance game is just that
much better than theirs?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev099701_MSG0021
rows.name:
I imagine that sort of gap could end up making trouble
for us, but such is life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev099701_MSG0022
rows.name: At least this time it's working in our favor![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev099701_MSG0023
rows.name:
Hmm? What's up? Did you find the access code to get
into that Lifehold unit?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev099701_MSG0024
rows.name: ...What? That code was a Ganglion trap?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev099701_MSG0025
rows.name:
Ugh, that is LOW! I hope you go mop the floor with
every last one of them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev099701_MSG0026
rows.name:
Go stomp those slimy bastards and bring that Lifehold
data home![ST:wait ]
